1: <sup>1</sup> O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
2: <sup>2</sup> O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
3: <sup>3</sup> O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
4: <sup>4</sup> To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
5: <sup>5</sup> To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
6: <sup>6</sup> To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
7: <sup>7</sup> To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
8: <sup>8</sup> The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
9: <sup>9</sup> The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
10: <sup>10</sup> To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
11: <sup>11</sup> And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:
12: <sup>12</sup> With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.
13: <sup>13</sup> To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:
14: <sup>14</sup> And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:
15: <sup>15</sup> But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.
16: <sup>16</sup> To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.
17: <sup>17</sup> To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
18: <sup>18</sup> And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
19: <sup>19</sup> Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:
20: <sup>20</sup> And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
21: <sup>21</sup> And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:
22: <sup>22</sup> Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.
23: <sup>23</sup> Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:
24: <sup>24</sup> And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
25: <sup>25</sup> Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
26: <sup>26</sup> O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
